urls.title: Football Clichés - Carriageworks Theatre
urls.description: Hyde Park Book Club & The Square Ball present Football Clichés  What the are unwritten rules of co-commentary? Who are the most boo-able team in the country? What’s the most “assistant referee” name possible? What are the traditional contents of a player’s proverbial “locker”? What’s the best red-card brandishing technique? And what specific footballing situations […]

tweets.text:

@FootballCliches Jermaine Jenas has just referred to Croatia as "an experienced outfit". Can an international side be described as an "outfit"? I'd always associated this with club football.

What’s the highest age you can be the wrong side of?
@FootballCliches Are you allowed players who were on a WC squad but never featured in any match? Example: Stoichkov in 1994 and Ronaldo in 2002?

@FootballCliches Schumacher 🇩🇪 (1982)

Mohammadi 🇮🇷 (2018)
Mills 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 (2002)
Massing 🇨🇲 (1990)
Simunic 🇭🇷(2006)
Ilunga 🇨🇩 (1974)

Burley 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 (1998)
Maradona 🇦🇷 (1994)

Lukaku 🇧🇪 (2022)
Fred 🇧🇷 (2014)
Suarez 🇺🇾 (2010)
@FootballCliches Good way to while away an hour since there's no matches today.

The Athletic is too busy doing real, valuable journalism to send a camera crew with us as we bumrush Diana Ross at a concert and ask her why she couldn’t hit a straightforward penalty kick. Disgusting.

@FootballCliches With a twist, every World Cup is represented, none twice.
Chilavert 🇵🇾 98 02
Lahm 🇩🇪 06 10 14, McGrath 🇮🇪90 94, Moore🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿62 66 70, Guerreiro 🇵🇹 18 22
Socrates🇧🇷 82 86, Varela🇺🇾 50 54, Meazza🇮🇹34 38
Stabile🇦🇷 30, Fontaine🇫🇷 58, Rensenbrink🇳🇱 74 78

José Leandro Andrade – Xavi
Pelé – Diego Maradona – Johan Cruyff
Ferenc Puskas
